artist: Artist: Pierre Alechinsky; Publisher: Yves Rivière Editeur, Paris
description: 9 printed, folded sheets; scrawling text; black-and-white photo image partially obscured by overlapping image of splatters; portfolio with 8 prints; stored in acrylic box with clear top and white bottom; lender's archive #006
image_copyright: © Pierre Alechinsky and Yves Rivi%C3%A8re %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York
markings: Numbered in pencil below each right-hand print: 45/120
medium: Photographs printed in collotype, overlaid with etchings and color lithographed calligraphy; loose in portfolio
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed: Signed in pencil below each right-hand print: Alechinsky
title: Comme à la maison
